title: Summer School
description: A web application for managing summer school classes, bookings, and feedback.
features: Students can see booked classes and check payment history.
Instructors can create classes, check the students who booked the classes, and check feedback by Admin.
Admin can send feedback to classes submitted by instructors and approve or deny the classes.

title: Online Toy Store
description: An online store where clients can add toys to their inventory.
features: Clients can add toys to their inventory.
Admin can add new toys and delete toys.
Clients can view the details of the toys.

title: Chef Finder
description: A website for finding and hiring chefs and discovering their recipes.
features: Website consists of featured chefs with a hiring and contact section.
Admin can add blogs in the Blog page, which can be viewed by visitors.
Clients can see chef's details and their recipes.
